title: Fashions on the field
creator_credit: Movietonenews, Frank Killian and Syd Wood
brief_description: The 1964 Victorian Racing Club Spring Carnival. Horse racing, fashion shows and fashion on the field. Race commentary: Bert Bryant. Also appearing: Sir Henry Bolte, Sir Rohan Delacombe, Pay Hyland, Miss Australia 1964 and Lord Mayor Curtis.
